text:
Hey everyone, I was hoping you might help. We have created a sandbox account alongside a clients 'production' HubSpot account as a sort of test environment, firstly, is this the correct way to use a sandbox?

In essence, we are looking to use the sandbox as a direct copy of the production account to be able to test certain integrations without affecting the ongoing business. Additionally, is there anything we need to do to sync up the production environment with the sandbox environment?
Anyone avaliable to help me with a problem in the <#CJ5DN6RKP|email-development> channel?
Is there any way to trigger webhook on blog post update?????

You can only really move files from the Design Manager. And pages, blogs, etc. Will have toe moved manually.

Depending what you are doing you could probably use Content Staging

Finally, I'm taking these <https://academy.HubSpot.com/courses/website-optimization?library=true&_ga=2.267103566.1361477109.1624282998-254455235.1613778551|Optimización Web> (1.5h)
<https://academy.HubSpot.com/lessons/remote-leadership|Liderazgo remoto> (0.6h)
<https://app.HubSpot.com/academy/2202832/tracks/108/748/3798?ruid=8464823&_ga=2.238269512.979581631.1629124357-254455235.1613778551&rpid=53|CMS Hub Enterprise> (1h)
<https://app.HubSpot.com/academy/549760/tracks/121/813/4350?iframeParent=https%3A%2F%2Facademy.HubSpot.com&hubs_signup-url=academy.HubSpot.com%2Fcourses%2Fcms-for-developers&track=121&landingPageType=course&via=content-signup|HubSpot for Developers (actualizado)> (3h)
Hi! Some HTML elements outside the post content are getting to my search results descriptions.. does someone knows a workaround for this problem?

I am looking to retrieve related information from just a deal objectId.  I would like to be able to get the Company and Contacts associated with a deal just based on the information provided by a webhook being called by the deal transition.  Any suggestions on what requests to be making?

Hi <@U02C7G18A7J>,

You can try a procedure from here:

1. Fetch the Deal from HubSpot via API:
<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/deals/get_deal>

This API will provide you *associatedCompanyIds* ( To fetch associated company details) & *associatedVids (*to fetch associated Contact details) along with other deal details.

2. Fetch Associated Company details using *associatedCompanyIds* via API
<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/companies/get_company>

3. Fetch Associated Contacts details using *associatedVids* via API

<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/contacts/get_batch_by_vid>

Hope this will help :-)

Hello. I have a customer that use HubSpot forms on their website. They also use Cookiebot as consent manager. Of some reason, suddenly HubSpots forms doesn’t show up any more. Visitor needs to give permission to marketing consent in Cookiebot banner. After that HubSpot forms is visible. As a visitor I don’t get any more cookie after giving permission. Does anybody knows why Cookiebot stops HS forms to be loaded? Is there any way to load HS forms for only necessary given consent?
